overview: A group of students hold an orientation while making documentation in a quiet location. One of them, Dara, could see spirits nearby.At one point, she sees a ghost of their own classmates. They begai to find out what really happened and finally find out that their friend named Ade, has disappeared and was last seen in the Old City area. They try to find out. This group of students began to get mysterious harassments from a ghost.
title: Kota Tua Jakarta
